thread.title: The Masked Singer unveils Weather as one of the biggest stars yet in tense first episode
thread.title_full: The Masked Singer unveils Weather as one of the biggest stars yet in tense first episode

title: The Masked Singer unveils Weather as one of the biggest stars yet in tense first episode
text: Identity of Weather revealed on The Masked Singer [The Masked Singer](/latest/masked-singer) has unveiled the identity of Weather as singing superstar and all-round icon Dionne Warwick in a nail-biting first episode. Weather found herself in the bottom three, alongside Maypole and Rat after each of them performed. The judges decided to save Maypole and Rat after being impressed by their performances, leading to Weather's identity being revealed to the shocked judges. As the character took off her mask, host Joel Dommett, as well as all four judges, were left speechless after singing icon Dionne Warwick revealed herself. "It's soul legend Dionne Warwick everybody," Joel, 38, exclaimed as Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall, Mo Gilligan and guest host Charlie Simpson looked on in shock. Mo took the opportunity to tell Dionne, 83, that he used to play her music in his home when he was younger as he paid tribute to the iconic star. READ MORE: [ The Masked Singer fans think Maypole is missing judge after being replaced ](/showbiz/tv-radio/1850416/masked-singer-maypole-missing-judge-rita-ora) [LATEST] Jonathan, Davina and Charlie all got their guesses right as they thought it was Dionne under the mask as Weather. Mo guessed incorrectly, as he thought the star was fellow singer Bonnie Tyler. Fans rushed to X, formerly known as One person said: "#TheMaskedSinger is so unserious, actual Dionne Warwick voted out first #TheMaskedSinger." (sic) Don't miss... (sic) A third wrote: "They guess Dionne Warwick and then vote her off WTAF???? #TheMaskedSinger." (sic) While a fourth added: "What the Dickens, Dionne Warwick can’t be out first. She’s singing royalty. #TheMaskedSinger." (sic) The Masked Singer continues next Saturday on ITV1 and ITVX.
